column1: #Text=I needa know what day it is !
#Text=It 's still two days before the invasion !
#Text=" Aang says : " Sokka , you 've got ta get up drill your rock - climbing exercises .
#Text=" Aang says : " In one of my dreams , you were running from Fire Nation soldiers , trying to climb this cliff , but you were too slow and they got you !
#Text=" Sokka says : " But that was just a dream .
#Text=" Aang says : " Then climb that cliff !
